This study aim pilot procedure multifaceted , culturally appropriate intervention preschool child provide preliminary assessment effectiveness intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Kindergarten-based Intervention Childhood Obesity Guangzhou ( KICOG )
DOC.detailed_description: The intervention protocol develop expert group National Children Obesity Intervention Team , comprise pediatrician , child healthcare doctor , preschool teacher , nutritionist , include three integrated component : Component 1 - training kindergarten staff : Before start program , two member intervention team ( dietitian physician ) deliver eight 40-min session ( twice week month ) dietary management child daily food purchase school doctor kitchen staff . During trial , two health education doctor give lecture every two month general knowledge nutrition preschool staff , focus promotion healthy food restriction unhealthy food . To assess effectiveness lecture , administer questionnaire material cover . We also train kitchen staff use dietary software plan menu balance nutrition preschool child . Component 2 - curriculum promote healthy diet lifestyle : We design health education curriculum associate picture book child . Children intervention group receive 20-minute health education lesson every week , learn activity game cover healthy food choice , appropriate portion size eat pace , reduction sedentary behaviour . Learning aid colourful picture book card , food model , nursery rhyme story use . Two element introduce increase child 's activity lunchtime activity daily dance le 10 minute break . Component 3 - collaboration family kindergartens : We organize lecture design parent every two month intervention period . Topics cover include cause harm childhood obesity , advice healthy diet ( increase consumption vegetable fruit , reduce consumption meat , snack , fast food , eat , avoid sugary drink ) , body mass index ( BMI ) reference preschool-age child , use growth curve . We produce handbook communication family school , hand every family weekly , child 's health behaviour document reviewed teacher parent . Finally , parent notify child 's anthropometric measurement every three month , could plot interpret child 's growth curve .
